en.description: A pretend/synthesized example that uses all Voyager task parameter types for testing/training.

sample_string.description: An example of a String parameter type ('string').

sample_integer.description: An example of an Integer parameter type (99).

sample_choice.description: An example of a Choice parameter type ('string').

sample_catalog.description: An example of a Catalog parameter type ('c:\string\path\to\file.shp').

sample_folder.description: An example of a FolderLocation parameter type ('c:\string\path\to\folder\').

sample_checkbox.description: An example of a CheckBox parameter type (true/false).

sample_projection.description: An example of a Projection parameter type (4326).

sample_geometry.description: An example of a Geometry parameter type ('BBOX/WKT').

sample_mapview.description: An example of a MapView parameter type ('BBOX').
